#include <iostream>
#include <fstream>
#include <vector>
#include <string>
using namespace std;

int main(int argc, char** argv) {

////////// DO NOT EDIT! //////////
  string path = argv[1];        //
//////////////////////////////////  
  
  // Open the file
  ifstream file(path);
  if (!file) {
      cerr << "Error opening file." << endl;
      return 1;
  }

  // Read all lines into a vector
  vector<string> lines;
  string line;
  while (getline(file, line)) {
      lines.push_back(line);
  }

  // Print lines in reverse order
  for (int i = lines.size() - 1; i >= 0; --i) {
      cout << lines[i] << endl;
  }

  return 0;
}
